name: Pad Thai
detailedDescription: Traditional Thai rice noodles stir-fried with eggs, tofu, bean sprouts, and peanuts in a tangy tamarind sauce.

name: Beef Burger
description: Juicy beef patty with all the fixings
detailedDescription: Premium Angus beef patty with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, and our special sauce on a brioche bun.
